title: Eve Arnold in retrospect
creator_credit: Wonderland, BBC, Spencer Style and Beeban Kidron
brief_description: Eve Arnold, member of the celebrated Magnum photographic agency since 1957 is the subject of this informative documentary which looks not only at her work, but the influence her life experiences have had on her art. Her extensive portfolio of work includes many well known figures and has captured some of the centuries memorable moments. Subjects include; Margaret Thatcher, Malcolm X, Marilyn Monroe, Marlene Dietrich, Joan Crawford, plus many more celebrities, places and faces.
